options.content: Salesforce Platform Monitoring

panels.description: The # of open incidents against each Salesforce org.
panels.title: Salesforce Incidents

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: A Salesforce Incident has been opened against Production

Dashboard: https://metrics.platform.avalara.io/d/edqq6je4aevb4b/salesforce-monitoring?orgId=1
alert.name: Salesforce Production Incidents Alert

panels.description: The # of open incidents against Salesforce production over time.
panels.title: Salesforce Incidents Over Time - Production

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: A Salesforce Incident has been opened against ${environment}

Dashboard: https://metrics.platform.avalara.io/d/edqq6je4aevb4b/salesforce-monitoring?orgId=1
alert.name: Salesforce Sandbox Incidents Alert

panels.description: The # of open incidents against each Salesforce sandbox over time.
panels.title: Salesforce Incidents Over Time - Sandbox

panels.description: Displays incident details per Salesforce org, showing only unique combinations of Org, Severity, Latest Response, and Original Post. The time reflects when each combination first appeared.

defaults.noValue: No incidents in any Salesforce orgs during this time range

targets.expr: max by(pod, severity, message, environment, original_message) (max_over_time(salesforce_incidents{severity!="ok"}[5m]))
max by(pod, severity, message, environment, original_message) (max_over_time(salesforce_incidents{environment!="Production", severity!="ok"}[5m]))

panels.title: Incidents details

panels.description: The top API usage limits in real-time
panels.title: Top 10 API Usage Limits

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: Salesforce API Usage is over 90% for ${limit_name}

alert.name: Salesforce API Usage Alert

panels.description: The usage percentage for each API over time, excluding any APIs at 0% usage.
panels.title: Salesforce API Usage Over Time

panels.description: User licenses in Salesforce define the baseline level of features and permissions that a user can access within the Salesforce environment, determining what apps, objects, and functionalities are available to them based on their assigned license type.
panels.title: User Licenses Usage % - Top 10

panels.description: Count of total licenses and used licenses
panels.title: User Active Licenses Count

panels.description: Usage-based entitlements licenses in Salesforce are licenses that track and limit the consumption of specific features or services based on usage metrics, such as API calls or storage, rather than per-user allocations.
panels.title: Usage Based Entitlements Usage % - Top 10

panels.description: Count of total licenses and used licenses
panels.title: Usage based Entitlements Licenses Count

panels.description: Licenses to grants access to additional features or permissions beyond the standard Salesforce license. It allows administrators to assign specific sets of permissions to users on top of their existing user license, enabling more granular control over feature access and customization.
panels.title: Permission Set License Usage % - Top 15

panels.description: Permissionset Active Licenses details
panels.title: Permissionset Licenses Count (Used vs Total)

panels.description: Monitor Default and Active billing fields for CyberSource (CC) and CyberSource (ACH) payment gateways
panels.title: Check Payment Gateway status

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: Payment Gateway Status has changed in the orgs below. 

Please review details under section "Payment Gateway and Method Status" on Dashboard: https://metrics.platform.avalara.io/d/edqq6je4aevb4b/salesforce-monitoring?orgId=1
alert.name: Payment Gateway Status Change Alert

panels.description:
Monitor Default and Active billing fields for CyberSource (CC) and CyberSource (ACH) payment gateways.
Fields must be 'false' at any time.
panels.title: Payment Method using Valid Payment Gateways

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: Active Billing Field for Payment Methods has changed in the orgs below. 

Please review details under section "Payment Gateway and Method Status" on Dashboard: https://metrics.platform.avalara.io/d/edqq6je4aevb4b/salesforce-monitoring?orgId=1

**
alert.name: Active Billing Payment Methods Alert

panels.description:
Monitor Active billing field for payment methods.
Active billing field must be 'false' at any time.
panels.title: Payment Method where Active billing is True

panels.description: Payment Gateway status change details

defaults.noValue: No change in Payment Gateway status in FullQA

targets.expr: label_replace(count by(billing_active_status, billing_default_status, billing_gateway_type, payment_gateway_name, record_id, user_name, last_modified_date) (payment_gateway_status{billing_active_status!="N/A"}), "last_modified_date", "$1", "last_modified_date", "(.+)\\.[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+")

panels.title: Details of Payment method using valid payment gateway in FullQA

panels.description: Payment Gateway status change details

defaults.noValue: No change in Payment Gateway status in FullQAB

targets.expr: label_replace(count by(billing_active_status, billing_default_status, billing_gateway_type, payment_gateway_name, record_id, user_name, last_modified_date) (payment_gateway_status_fqab{billing_active_status!="N/A"}), "last_modified_date", "$1", "last_modified_date", "(.+)\\.[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+")

panels.title: Details of Payment method using valid payment gateway in FullQAB

panels.description:
Monitor records if Active billing is True for Payment methods.
Active billing must be False at any time.

targets.expr: label_replace(count by(billing_active_status, billing_autopay_status, billing_payment_gateway_name, payment_gateway_token, payment_method_id, payment_method_name, user_name, last_modified_date) (payment_method_status{billing_active_status!="N/A"}), "last_modified_date", "$1", "last_modified_date", "(.+)\\.[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+")

panels.title: Active billing Payment Method Status Overview in FullQA

panels.description:
Monitor records if Active billing is True for Payment methods.
Active billing must be False at any time.

defaults.noValue: No change in Payment Gateway status in FullQAB

targets.expr: label_replace(count by(billing_active_status, billing_autopay_status, billing_payment_gateway_name, payment_gateway_token, payment_method_id, payment_method_name, user_name, last_modified_date) (payment_method_status_fqab{billing_active_status!="N/A"}), "last_modified_date", "$1", "last_modified_date", "(.+)\\.[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+")

panels.title: Active billing Payment Method Status Overview in FullQAB

options.content:
# Deployment Metric Disclaimers

The production deployment metrics in this dashboard are retrieved directly from Salesforce Production, not GitLab. Salesforce deployment metrics include GitLab deployments/validations, change-set deployments, and package installations.

Salesforce only retains deployment records for about 30 days, so the metrics shown will only reflect recent activity within the current month.

These metrics do NOT capture the full GitLab deployment process, which includes additional validations and check-only deployments for Apex packages that optimize the Apex deployment process.

Validation metrics are now included in this dashboard. These validations include:

- Standalone validations run from GitLab Merge Requests (MRs), which may be run multiple times before changes are ultimately deployed to Production.
- Pre-deployment validations which run automatically in deployment pipelines prior to quick-deployments for Apex packages.

For more detailed metrics covering the full GitLab deployment pipeline over a longer period of time, please refer to the [Hex report](https://app.hex.tech/avalara/app/55b1430d-a9e3-4eaf-a227-6e4f766daf55/latest?).

panels.description: Monitors and lists users who query more than 10,000 records in Salesforce

defaults.noValue: No operation on >10k records

targets.expr: count by (entity_name, method, query_type, rows_processed, user_id, user_name) (${interval}_user_querying_large_records)

panels.title: List of users querying large (>10k) records (${interval})

panels.description: Monitors and lists users exporting Reports

defaults.noValue: No Report was exported in Last hour

panels.title: Count of possible suspicious activities from Audit Trail logs

panels.description: List of possible suspicious activities from Audit Trail logs

defaults.noValue: No Audit Trail log captured for selected Interval

targets.expr: label_replace(count by (action, section, user, created_date, display, delegate_user) (suspicious_records), "created_date", "$1", "created_date", "(.+)\\.[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+")

panels.title: List of possible suspicious activities from Audit Trail logs
